data.name: Spectral Shades: Fragments
data.detailed_description:
Spectral Shades: Fragments is a magical girl themed exploration game, where the female protagonist Chiharu finds herself lost in the depths of an unknown and surreal space, which soon turns out to also be the battle ground of two magical girls. Both of them seem to have a particular interest in poor Chiharu.

Find your way through this surreal environment, solve puzzles, acquire objects that grant you new abilities and try to find your way out. Oh, and maybe save a magical girl in the meantime.

Spectral Shades: Fragments…
  • is a short game with multiple endings and little hand holding.
  • has some eerie or unsettling moments. It’s a RPG Maker horror adventure after all.
  • has some flashing images and colors. So if you are sensitive, please be aware.
  • has magical girls. That are fighting about Chiharu.
